channel.title: The Tempest on FishLasers
channel.description: Recent content in The Tempest on FishLasers

item.title: The Bones and Guts are on Display: Behind the Sound and Stage Design of The Tempest
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description:
Last month my work for The Tempest at the Oxford Playhouse was covered by the wonderful Julia Males for The Isis Magazine.

The full article can be found here:

“The Bones and Guts are on Display: Behind the Sound and Stage Design of The Tempest”

item.title: The Tempest: Trailer
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description:
This was a ridiculously exciting project to work on.

Trailer credits: Directed and edited by Faith Wong Director of Photography: Coco Cottam Sound Design: Alva Orr

Stay tuned for more about the sound of the show itself!
